<about me>|



Hello! My name is Sergei Demianenko, I'm 19 years old. I am a junior front-end developer. I study oriental languages ​​and literature at Kiev National Linguistic University. But my hobby is programming. Since childhood, I studied how a computer works, how the Internet works, and what different programs do. The fact is that I know mathematics well, I have well-developed logic and cleanliness in work. I also quickly learn and bring any business to the end, I always like to learn something new. In addition, I like to work in a team, I am sociable and purposeful person. My hobbies include sports, reading, travelling. Perhaps this is enough for the story. If you have any questions, I am ready to answer each of them.
